title: How to Care for 5 Days Old Chicks #business #chicken #homesteading

subtasks: Change treated paper and provide water daily.
Ensure proper temperature (90-95°F) using natural sunlight.
Feed chick crumbs and monitor intake.
Keep water clean and fresh, changing frequently.
Provide good ventilation to prevent ammonia buildup.
Check for signs of illness (e.g., unusual breathing, diarrhea).
Observe feather growth and activity levels.
